edu.uci.nomoads.training

Class Trainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.nomoads.training.Trainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DomainAdsTrainer, NetworkLayerTrainer, UrlPathAdsTrainer

    abstract class Trainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Trains binary classifiers

      • jsonDomainOSTreeLabels

        protected final org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonDomainOSTreeLabels
        Keeps tree labels belonging to each domainOS. It's filled out during training and is saved to a JSON file upon training completion.

    • Method Detail

      • train

        public void train()
        Splits data into bins and picks one of the bins to test on. Procedure is repeated until all 'domains' had a chance to be tested

      • trainOneDomain

        public weka.core.Instances trainOneDomain(org.json.simple.JSONObject trFlows,
                                          MetaEvaluationMeasures mem)
        Train a classifier given based on provided training data
        Parameters:
        trFlows - JSON object containing all training data
        mem - - filled with info description of the training dataset

      • populateTrainingSet

        public TrainingData populateTrainingSet(org.json.simple.JSONObject trFlows,
                                        int thresholdFrequency,
                                        MetaEvaluationMeasures mem)

      • populateTrainingMatrix

        public TrainingData populateTrainingMatrix(org.json.simple.JSONObject domainOSFlows,
                                           TrainingData trainingData)
        Given positive lines and negative lines, generate the overall word_count and trainMatrix. All possible features are saved (all words, all PII, package names, etc.) Child classes pick features saved here in populateArff(Info, TrainingData, int).
        Parameters:
        trainingData - - the original training data object, could be empty or prefilled with some customized entries

        Parameters:

        instances -

                                              double[] instanceValue,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<weka.core.Attribute> attributes)
        Adds LABEL_POSITIVE or LABEL_NEGATIVE as the last attribute, depending on if there is an ad or not, and returns the finished Instance.

        attributes -

      • saveTreeLabels

        public boolean saveTreeLabels(java.lang.String domainOS,
                              java.lang.String pii,
                              weka.classifiers.trees.J48 j48classifier)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves provided data in JSON format, for saving to disk upon training completion
        Parameters:
        domainOS -
        pii - PII label
        j48classifier - the tree to parse and extract nodes from
        Returns:
        true if labels were saved, false if no labels were found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getClassifier

        public weka.classifiers.Classifier getClassifier()
        Get a J48 classifier. NOTE: ReCon supports more classifiers here, but for now we only support trees.

      • isPIIValue

      • getLine

        protected abstract java.lang.String getLine(org.json.simple.JSONObject packet)
        Convert given packet object into a String. Children can pick which fields of the object to include. For instance, they can include the entire URL, or just its path component.
        Parameters:
        packet - the packet object
        Returns:
        a String with all the fields concatenated
